comment: Example configuration for Claude Code integration (Phase 1 + Phase 2)
comment2: Copy this section to your config.json and add your API key

claude_integration.comment: Phase 1: Emergency Fallback - Claude steps in when Ollama models fail
claude_integration.comment2: Phase 2: Quality Validator - Claude validates critical outputs before task complete
claude_integration.comment_model: Options: claude-3-5-haiku-20241022 (cheapest), claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022 (recommended), claude-opus-4-20250514 (powerful), claude-opus-4-5-20250514 (most powerful)
claude_integration.comment_threshold: Number of Ollama failures before escalating to Claude. Use 1 for reliable batch processing (escalates after first failure). Use 2-3 for cost savings (accepts some failures). Lower = more Claude usage = higher cost but higher success rate.
claude_integration.comment_limit: Maximum Claude API calls per hour to prevent runaway costs. Adjust based on your budget and needs
claude_integration.comment_critical: Tasks that escalate to Claude after only 1 failure instead of threshold. Use for operations that must succeed

validation.comment: Phase 2: Quality Validator - Validate outputs before marking tasks complete
validation.comment_enabled: Set to true to enable validation system
validation.comment_validate_tasks: Which agent types should have outputs validated. Add PLANNER for even more coverage
validation.comment_max_retries: Maximum retry attempts after validation failure. Higher = more robust but slower
validation.comment_validation_model: Model to use for validation (usually cheaper/faster Haiku is fine)
validation.comment_feedback_model: Model to use for generating improvement feedback

comment_cost_examples: Phase 1 cost per 100 tasks with 5% escalation: Haiku=$0.035, Sonnet=$0.105 (recommended), Opus 4=$0.175
comment_phase2_cost: Phase 2 validation cost per 100 tasks: $0.020 (vs $0.105 Phase 1 only) - 80% savings with validation feedback
comment_usage_tracking: All Claude usage logged to ~/.ollmcp/claude_usage.json with costs and reasons. View with: cat ~/.ollmcp/claude_usage.json | jq
comment_see_docs: Phase 1: See docs/claude_integration.md | Phase 2: See docs/phase2_quality_validator.md
